name: Daruma Crusher
description:
--Daruma is a asian traditional doll , and misterious monster too.

One Day,"Daruma-strom" coveres over the world.
Bad darumas have fallen to each country.

Kilo decided to beat all bad darumas in own fist....
Kilo is trying to crush all bad darumas with a punch.
If he can get W target , his mirror image will be copied.
Attack the Darumaster in the last stage!
